ShadowRootGetHTML.summary: The getHTML() method of the interface is used to serialize a shadow root's DOM to an HTML string.

remarks.para:
The method provides an options argument that enables the serialization of child nodes that are shadow roots.
The options can be used to include nested shadow roots that have been set as , and/or a specified array of objects, which may be either open or closed.
Without arguments, child nodes that are shadow roots are not serialized, and this method behaves in the same way as reading the value of .

ShadowRootGetHTML.returns: A string that represents the HTML serialization of the shadow root.
